channel.title: MATRIX. DwarMulticannon FIXED!
channel.description:
I got the snippet from here, but i get these error's. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/snippets/450214-decent-dwarf-cannon.html Here are the error's: [code]starting... src\com\rs\net\encoders\WorldPacketsEncoder.java:1105: error: cannot find symbol
if (player.getDwarfCannon().hasCannon()) { ^ symbol: method getDwarfCannon() location: variable player of type Player src\com\rs\net\encoders\WorldPacketsEncoder.java:1106: error: cannot find symbol
player.getDwarfCannon().pickUpDwarfCannon(0, player.getD warfCannon().getObject()); ^ symbol: method getDwarfCannon() location: variable player of type Player src\com\rs\net\encoders\WorldPacketsEncoder.java:1106: error: cannot find symbol
player.getDwarfCannon().pickUpDwarfCannon(0, player.getD warfCannon().getObject()); ^ symbol: method getDwarfCannon() location: variable player of type Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:76: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You already have a cannon setup."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:83: error: cannot find symbol .sm("You do not have all the required items to set up the Dw arf Multi-Cannon."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:102: error: cannot find symbol .sm("You place the cannon base on the ground..."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:111: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You add the stand..."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:120: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You add the barrel..."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:131: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You add the furnace..."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:152: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You are not the owner of this Dwarf Cannon."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:156: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("Your cannon is already firing!"); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:160: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("Your cannon has no ammo left!"); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:278: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("Your cannon has ran out of ammo!"); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:299: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You are not the owner of this Dwarf Cannon."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:304: error: cannot find symbol .sm("Please finish setting up your current cannon before pic king it up."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:338: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm("You are not the owner of this Dwarf Cannon."); ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:345: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm( ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player src\com\rs\game\player\content\DwarfCannon.java:357: error: cannot find symbol getPlayer().sm( ^ symbol: method sm(String) location: class Player 18 errors finished Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: MATRIX. DwarMulticannon FIXED!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[code=java]private DwarfCannon cannon = new DwarfCannon();

public void getDwarfCannon() {
return cannon;
}[/code]

in Player.java

Read full topic
